title: PREVNAR 20 Contraindications (pneumococcal 20-valent conjugate vaccine)
description: 4 CONTRAINDICATIONS Do not administer Prevnar 20 to individuals with a severe allergic reaction (e.g., anaphylaxis) to any component of Prevnar 20 or to diphtheria toxoid [see Description (11) ] .
cleaned_text: 4 CONTRAINDICATIONS Do not administer Prevnar 20 to individuals with a severe allergic reaction (e.g., anaphylaxis) to any component of Prevnar 20 or to diphtheria toxoid [see [Description (11)](#S11)]. In order to provide you with relevant and meaningful content we need to know more about you. Please choose the category that best describes you.
